description: To address the taskbar configuration issues, apply the update identified in KB-5030300. This update restores the improved search box experience, which allows users to easily access applications, files, and settings directly from the taskbar. Users can leverage the latest search enhancements, including search highlights, by installing this update. Additionally, it provides an option for restoring previous search configurations through the taskbar's shortcut menu. Ensuring systems are updated to OS Build 19045.3516 is essential for this functionality.
